price: Obraćajte Mu se predano! Bojte se Njega i obavljajte namaz, i ne budite od onih koji Mu druge ravnim smatraju,
arabic: ۞ مُنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: munībīna ilayhi wa-ittaqūhu wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata walā takūnū mina al-mush'rikīna
